doc:
Maurice Evans (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Evans_(actor) 0 Maurice Herbert Evans (3 June 1901 – 12 March 1989) was a British actor, noted for his interpretations of Shakespearean characters. His best-known screen roles are Dr. Zaius in the 1968 film Planet of the Apes and as Samantha Stephens's father, Maurice, on Bewitched. Maurice_Herbert_Evans ( 3_June_1901 – 12_March_1989 ) was a_British_actor , noted for his_interpretations of Shakespearean_characters . His_best-known_screen_roles are Dr._Zaius in the_1968_film_Planet of the_Apes and as Samantha_Stephens 's_father , Maurice , on Bewitched .
